dialogues: Wait for the maze to disappear, then move one step at a time to learn the game.
This is the maze and you have to reach '&' avoiding collisions with the walls
At the top right corner, you can see 'Persistence' which decreases with time and collisions.
This is the box. You have to 'THINK INSIDE THE BOX' as it will show your path.
Did you notice? 'Persistence' decreases slower in the box. Go back and check.
Higher the persistence, the better it is. If it hits zero, the game will end.
Just remember, you will lose more and more persistence with each collision.
Now, let's use the power of echo. Press 'e' to hear. It will give you an idea about the location of walls. Move right.
In top left corner, it shows the number of collisions you have in each level.
If not, make a collision by moving down.
What will you do if you are not sure where the wall is now?
Will you go back to the box? Or will you hear an echo?
Press 'e' and you can hear a louder echo. As the wall approaches, the echo will become louder.
Did you notice, an echo is coming from right? Yes, echo's direction depends on your last move.
Press 'e'. Here you will hear the loudest echo from the right. That means, there is a wall to your right.
By pressing 'q', you can pause the game. With 'p', you can start playing again and with 'q', it all ends.
This is the last box where you can stay and think your next moves.
Your persistence will decrease at a lower rate inside the box. So, give it some thought.
Now you know the rules. And so do I, of course.
Use echoes wisely, make minimum collisions and think 'INSIDE THE BOX'
The real game approaches you. Reach & to finish the tutorial.
